description: Why is porn being allowed on flathub?

I literally spent 40 minutes just tapping space to go through this "game" and I think it only gave me 4 interaction prompts total. The art is mostly photos put through some image processing, the scenery is redundant.... It's not a game, and even as a story, it's not interesting or compelling, and the settings are so boring and repetitive that it's not even enjoyable to just tap through.
summary: Not a game, very little interaction, very long-winded

description: This a really good visual novel. Also this is an Eroge (which means it's rating of adults only is true)

This was probably the first visual novel I ever played. I realize that it won't be for everybody (due to adult material and slower gameplay), but I felt like it told a number of interesting stories (backstories of the various girls) and I found the setting of the game to be quite immersive. I enjoyed the art and found the character development to be rather good.

If you are a person who has never tried playing a visual novel before, but have seen and like anime or manga and aren't totally turned off by fanservice, then give this game a shot.
This is a great visual novel. Anyone complaining that it has adult content should look at the rating.

summary: probably the best visual novel ever made

description: Content like this should not be allowed on the platform.
summary: Why does this contain adult material if the content is about minors?

description: classic vn from the folks over at 4chan
Замечательная новелла, единственная в своем роде с подобной тематикой. Трогательная, что самое главное.
